item.title: Removing the back button in UINavigationController.
item.description: Removes the text of the back button in UINavigationController. Change “< back” to “<”. let backButton = UIBarButtonItem(title: "", style: .plain, target: nil, action: nil) self.

item.title: Adding a Custom Cell to UICollectionView
item.description: I tried to add a custumCollection cell to UICollectionView. The NSStringFromClass(CustumCollectionViewCell.self), which converts class names to strings, is very useful when using UITableView or UICollectionView.
